meta.expr:content: data:blog.pageTitle + ", Keyword 1, Keyword 2, Keyword 3, Keyword 4, Keyword 5, dsb"
meta.name: keywords

b:if.cond: data:blog.pageType in {"archive"} or data:blog.searchLabel or data:blog.searchQuery

b:includable.b:comment: We don't display labels on the home page.
We call super.postShareButtons from the migrated positions.
Overridden, and migrated to postFooter. Called as postFooterJumpLink.
Ripple, and show 'keep reading' as the default.
Re-order the thumbnail before the snippet, add 'Keep reading' link.
Default the title to 'Popular posts from this blog'.
Add a 'keep reading' link to the item-content.

b:include.data: { buttonClass: "flat-button", limit: 1, items: data:this.data, itemSet: "data", itemsMarkup: "super.hierarchy" }
b:include.name: extendableItems

b:with.value: "window.prompt(\"Copy to clipboard: Ctrl+C, Enter\", \"" + data:originalUrl + "\"); return false;"

b:includable.b:comment: Ripple, and show 'keep reading' as the default.
Overridden, and migrated to postFooter. Called as postFooterJumpLink.
We don't display labels on the home page.
We call super.postShareButtons from the migrated positions.
Re-order the thumbnail before the snippet, add 'Keep reading' link.

div.h2: Sorry, the page you were looking for in this blog does not exist.

b:with.value: "window.prompt(\"Copy to clipboard: Ctrl+C, Enter\", \"" + data:originalUrl + "\"); return false;"

b:include.data: { sharingId: data:sharingId, originalUrl: data:post.url, platforms: data:this.sharing.platforms, shareUrl: data:post.shareUrl, shareTitle: data:post.title, }
b:include.name: sharingButtons

b:includable.b:comment: Default the title to 'Popular posts from this blog'.

b:with.value: "window.prompt(\"Copy to clipboard: Ctrl+C, Enter\", \"" + data:originalUrl + "\"); return false;"
